Name: Honey Blossom
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: Soft, fruity, yet adult. (Contains trace amounts of alcohol due to the Angostura bitters).
History: Created in 2003 by Tim Phillips at the GE Club, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Honey Blossom contains 84 calories
